Sonatel (Société Nationale des Télécommunications du Senegal) bụ onye na-eweta ekwentị na Senegal
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na telephony ahịrị ahịrị, ekwentị mkpanaaka, ọrụ ịntanetị, telivishọn na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-etinye aka n'iwu netwọk fiber optics na Africa ma na-ejikwa eriri fiber 2,200 na Senegal.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Dakar, isi obodo Senegal
nwere 42.33% njikwa na Sonatel, nke edepụtara na Bourse Régionale des Valeurs Mobilières (BRVM).
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke abụọ na-enye ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka na Bamako, Mali, ma nwee ndị ahịa ekwentị 1,000,000 na mba ahụ.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-etinye aka na ịmepụta netwọk fiber optics na Africa ma na-ejikwa eriri fiber 2,200 kilomita na Senegal
Madagascar, Côte d'Ivoire, Mali na Moldova.
